entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries and rain showers ending this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 6:37 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
